SELECT pd.prod_name, pd.prod_price, up.grade,gd.discount_rate,up.up_regdate,up.sale_date, im.img_srcs, up.up_id FROM products pd JOIN used_products up on pd.prod_id = up.prod_id JOIN grades gd on up.grade = gd.grade JOIN imgs im on pd.prod_id = im.prod_id WHERE im.img_tag = 'thumNail' AND up.purchase_id = #{user_id} AND (#{start_date}<=sale_date and sale_date <=#{end_date}) order by sale_date desc
